snippet: A trial opened this month for a dozen protesters arrested at a demonstration last year in Moscow. The defendants face charges that could lead to 3 to 12 years in prison. Here are the charges against five of them, and videos of their actions.
lead_paragraph: A trial opened this month for a dozen protesters arrested at a demonstration last year in Moscow. The defendants face charges that could lead to 3 to 12 years in prison. Here are the charges against five of them, and videos of their actions.
